mapper.select: SELECT dep.id,dep.depcode,dep.depname,dep.parentdepid FROM tb_id_user u LEFT JOIN tb_id_personalinformation per ON per.userid=u.id LEFT JOIN tb_id_department dep ON dep.id=per.depid WHERE u.username=#{username} AND u.state=1 AND dep.state=1
select * from tb_id_department where depname = #{depname} and state=1
select * from tb_id_department where depname like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{depname},'%')) and state=1
select depname from tb_id_department where state=1
select * from tb_id_department where depcode = #{depcode} and state=1 ORDER BY ordercode
select * from tb_id_department where depcode LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{depcode},'%')) and state=1
select * from tb_id_department where deptypeid =#{deptypeid} and state=1
select * from tb_id_department where companyname =#{companyname} AND state=1 AND companyname <=> depname=0
select * from tb_id_department where id = #{id} and state=1 ORDER BY ordercode
select * from tb_id_department WHERE state=1 ORDER BY ordercode

select * from tb_id_department
parentdepid = #{_parameter,jdbcType=INTEGER}
parentdepid is null
and state=1
ORDER BY ordercode
SELECT dep.id AS deptId,dep.depname AS deptName FROM tb_id_department dep WHERE state=1
SELECT dep.id AS deptId, dep.depname AS deptName FROM tb_id_department dep WHERE dep.state = 1 AND dep.companyname<=>dep.depname=0
SELECT IFNULL(u.truename,'') AS principalTruename FROM tb_id_department dep LEFT JOIN tb_id_user u ON u.id=dep.principaluserid WHERE dep.state=1 AND dep.id=#{depid}

SELECT principaluser.id, principaluser.username, principaluser.truename, principaluser.employeenumber, principaluser.state, principaluser.isactive FROM tb_id_user u JOIN tb_id_personalinformation per ON per.userid = u.id JOIN tb_id_department dep ON dep.id = per.depid JOIN tb_id_user principaluser ON principaluser.id = dep.principaluserid WHERE u.username = #{username}
SELECT dep.depname FROM tb_id_department dep JOIN tb_hr_set deptype ON deptype.id=dep.deptypeid WHERE deptype.datavalue LIKE '%公司%' AND dep.state=1
SELECT dep.companyname,dep.depname FROM tb_id_user u JOIN tb_id_personalinformation per ON per.userid=u.id JOIN tb_id_department dep ON dep.id=per.depid WHERE u.truename=#{truename}
SELECT dep.companyname,dep.depname FROM tb_id_user u JOIN tb_id_personalinformation per ON per.userid=u.id JOIN tb_id_department dep ON dep.id=per.depid WHERE u.id=#{userid}
SELECT dep.depname FROM tb_id_user u JOIN tb_id_personalinformation per ON per.userid=u.id JOIN tb_id_department dep ON dep.id=per.depid WHERE u.employeenumber=#{depname}
mapper.insert: insert into tb_id_department (id, companyname, depname, depcode, functionaltypeid, dutydescription, parentdepid, principaluserid, deputyuserid, secretaryuserid, depdescription, state, ordercode, deptypeid, post_list ) VALUES (NULL , #{companyname}, #{depname}, #{depcode}, #{functionaltypeid}, #{dutydescription}, #{parentdepid}, #{principaluserid}, #{deputyuserid}, #{secretaryuserid}, #{depdescription}, 1,0,#{deptypeid},#{post_list})
